column4: heather: acer and aspire both had some serious issues with drivers, it sounds to me like you are having the same driver prob i did with ibex, try checking out your drivers in hard drive manager, also google wich drivers u should be using with your particular model. I need more info to help
Nope. Not an issue like that. I was using this very same driver with this very same hardware three hours ago before the reinstall and there were no issues.
Easy. My setup was EXACTLY the same as it is now, a fresh install from the ubuntu CD
